attributes.action: Hire Bill Bratton to run Met Police
attributes.additional_details: After all the riots and lawlessness we have seen over the past week, as well as the ineptness of the police to sufficiently deal with this situation, we need a radical change to the way the Met Police is run. We would like to see the Home Office recommend and Parliament approve the hiring of Bill Bratton, ex Police commissioner of NYC and Los Angeles.
